text: int main ( void ) { int n , m , i , j , p [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & m ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < m ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & p [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = m - 1 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { if ( p [ i ] [ j ] > p [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) p [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += p [ i ] [ j ] ; else p [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += p [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , p [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }

for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & p [ i ] [ j ] ) ; }
else p [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += p [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ;
